attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create cut london transport fares for students studying outside London. Students from London who do not study within the city are excempt from reduced fares on London transport, making travelling one of their principle expenditures. Students are not earning and for some the price of transport is an unaffordable yet unavoidable expense. In one week a student travelling everyday can easily spend over a third of their weekly allowance, if dependent on a student load, travelling in zones 1 and 2 alone. Transport is becoming increasingly expensive and yet little is being done for students from London, who only during termtime live elsehwere.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
